Posts.Content: Has anyone out here heard of or looked into the Gershon method for treating cancer? It does involve a chage of lifestyle on the eating level, but seems to work. There is a documentry about it on Netflix or can google the Gershon Method to do some research. My Mom had a stage 1 breast cancer and didn't have to have any radiation contrary to what they said she would need, but put her on the Arimedex. She now has joint pain, depression and has been diagnosed with osteoporosis. She's deciding if she wants to stay on it or not. She is 73. Does she really need to be on a hormone blocker? Bless you all...
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years
